summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: American Originals
Review Date: 2013/11/15
Store: Various  (Actor),     History  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, A&E Home Video, All A&E Titles
Product Description: ["They're a special breed - guys who go to work in the morning never knowing if they'll make it home alive that night. Every day is a struggle just to survive. For the loggers, wedged on a mountainside with behemoth trees, 60-ton machines, and razor-sharp chainsaws, the slightest miscalculation can spell disaster. The ice road truckers, steering gigantic 16-wheelers over frozen roads, face the specter of crashing through the surface, frostbite, or worse. And residents of the forbidding, icy north battle weather and unforgiving terrain just to eke out an existence. They all need every bit of ingenuity, grit, and know-how they can muster just to stay alive at least until the next gig.This adrenaline-pumping collection from HISTORY includes over 20 hours of action from Ax Men, Tougher in Alaska, and the record-breaking series Ice Road Truckers. You'll be awed as you watch these ordinary-seeming men face the kind of daily challenges most of us can't even imagine.Programs per disc:DISC 1: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 1: episodes 1-4DISC 2: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 2: episodes 5-8DISC 3: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 3: episodes 9-10 / bonus materialsDISC 4: Ice Road Truckers: On and Off The IceDISC 5: Dangerous Missions: Suicide Missions of D-Day / Marine Raiders / Forward Observers / PathfindersDISC 6: Dangerous Missions: Rescue Swimmers / Merrill's Marauders / Assault on Iwo Jima / Hostage NegotiatorsDISC 7: Ax Men S1, Vol 1: Man vs. Mountain / Risk and Reward / Storm Season Strikes / The Big HitDISC 8: Ax Men S1, Vol 2: Market Meltdown / Reversal of Fortune / The Close Call / Loggers Under FireDISC 9: Ax Men S1, Vol 3: A Logger's Thanksgiving / Black Friday / Storm of the CenturyDISC 10: Ax Men S1, Vol 4: The Toughest Season / Picking Up The Pieces / The Final HaulDISC 11: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 1: Episodes 1-4DISC 12: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 2: Episodes 5-7DISC 13: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 3: Episodes 8-10DISC 14: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 4: Episodes 11-13"]
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5.75 x 2.25 inches; 1.5 Pounds', 'Director': 'History', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '37 hours and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 26, 2009', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Studio': 'A&E Home Video', 'Number of discs': '14'}
Review Text: The shows work great and liked the value package to see other shows I haven't.  I got it to see Ax men and Ice road truckers but think its great to see the other shows too.
Review Title: American Original dvd package
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: Smokey and the Bandit (The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection)
Review Date: 2013/11/15
Store: Burt Reynolds  (Actor),     Sally Field  (Actor),     Hal Needham  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy
Product Description: ["Strap yourself in for hours of high-speed high jinks and jaw-dropping fun as Smokey and The Bandit: The 7-Movie Outlaw Collection puts you in the driver's seat of the rowdiest road-movie franchise of all time. With the three original movies that turned Burt Reynolds and CB radios into national obsessions and the four television movies that spread Bandit mania to a whole new generation, this seven-movie, four-disc collection puts every legendary performer, every outrageous stunt, every dadgum catchphrase in the whole Bandit universe into one place—yours!", 'Bonus Content:', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 1 - Smokey and the Bandit II:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Disc 2 - Smokey and the Bandit Part 3:', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', ']]>']

Willie and Alan help Miss Kay open a bakery, Jase gets up close and personal with his in-laws, Willie settles an old dodgeball score, and the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe.']

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lauren Brooks' The Kettlebell Body DVD
Review Date: 2017/07/19
Store: Lauren Brooks
Categories: Movies & TV, TV
Product Description: ['A genuine Lauren Brooks Kettlebell Fitness DVD']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Item Package Dimensions L x W x H': '7.5 x 5.3 x 0.6 inches', 'Package Weight': '0.3 Pounds', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Ounces', 'Brand Name': 'Lauren Brooks', 'Manufacturer': 'On The Edge Fitness', 'Part Number': 'LT', 'Best Sellers Rank': {'Movies & TV': 199846, 'DVD': 151734}, 'Date First Available': 'September 22, 2013'}
Review Text: I fully understood this video as a way for me to build better body mechanics/decrease injury risk while doing lower reps to a higher kettlebell weight. I was very happy with the result. I was sweaty, did my own stretching additional to warm up after the workout. I have been looking for a video like this to help advance me. I have prior experience with kettlbells and I can appreciate the instructors vision/ideals into this video.  I have had pain in the past from using higher weights and high reps and after doing these videos and the stretching I seriously feel good. I don't give this review lightly. I don't find it boring either as I add on to my other workouts and excited to have a video to use my heavier bells in. I thought there wasn't a way for me to advance past using a 25 pound bell but this dvd helped. My heavier ones 35 pound ones are in use now. I usually dead lifted my 25 pound bell. With this video I dared to dead lift 70 pounds when I weigh 130 and no pain feels awesome!  It makes me think I could go even heavier eventually as I build up tolerance.
Review Title: Lauren Brooks' The Kettlebell Body DVd
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: One Piece - Collection Ten
Review Date: 2017/07/19
Store: Colleen Clinkebeard  (Actor),     Luci Christian  (Actor),     Mike McFarland  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime
Product Description: ['Hoping to save their beloved boat, the Straw Hats drop anchor at the shipbuilding city of Water 7, but the prognosis for the Going Merry proves far worse than expected. The hits keep coming as Robin mysteriously vanishes, the Franky Family robs the crew blind, and Usopp goes rogue after a shocking battle with Luffy! As if things weren’t bleak enough, the gang finds themselves accused of a cold-hearted assassination attempt – and hunted by the entire city. Luffy and his remaining mates hatch a plan to prove their innocence, but a sinister gang of cutthroat killers stays one step ahead of their every move. Dark secrets and tragic pasts are revealed as Luffy and Zoro fall to a formidable foe, Chopper faces a life and death situation, and a monstrous storm threatens to sink the city once and for all!']
Average Rating: 4.9

Sabat', 'Dubbed': 'English', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Funimation Prod', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Review Text: YOU seriously want to make sure you have the next collection after the collection you finish and just keep watching! I love how you don't know how the one piece story is going to end up and gets more interesting as the story goes on.

Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime
Product Description: ['When Luffy and his mates drop anchor at the bizarre island of Long Ring Long Land, they’re challenged to a Davy Back Fight by the fast-talking Foxy Pirates! The Straw Hats are no strangers to squabbles, but the sacred code of pirates decrees that this contest could cost Luffy his crew! Next on the horizon for the Hats, it’s a case of missing memories as everyone but Robin forgets they ever knew each other. Usopp is quick to claim the title of captain, and Zoro does the unthinkable by attacking Luffy! Can Robin recover the crew’s lost recollections before disaster strikes!? She’d better work fast because far greater foes lie ahead, and the Straw Hats will need all hands on deck if they hope to survive the return of Captain Foxy – and the icy arrival of Admiral Ao']

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: One Piece - Collection One
Review Date: 2017/07/19
Store: Colleen Clinkenbeard  (Actor),     Luci Christian  (Actor),     Mike McFarland  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Anime
Product Description: ["The epic sets sail. It is the era of adventure, as countless souls are lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of dreams far greater than any they've ever dared to imagine. Wealth, fame, power - It's all available for the taking to the lucky soul that can find it: The legendary One Piece. Among those on the high seas is a youth on a quest to be king of them all - Luffy, the Straw Hat Pirate! But first he must find a ship, a crew and some supplies. Determined to recruit those at first unwilling to his cause, the young captain remains undaunted."]
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Colleen Clinkenbeard, Luci Christian, Sonny Strait, Christopher R Sabat, Mike McFarland', 'Language': 'English, Japanese', 'Number Of Discs': '4', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 7.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '26515054', 'Director': 'Mike McFarland', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Box set, Color, NTSC', 'Release date': 'July 26, 2011', 'Actors': 'Colleen Clinkenbeard, Luci Christian, Sonny Strait, Christopher R Sabat', 'Dubbed': 'English', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Funimation Prod', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Review Text: One piece is awesome! it was hilarious from the start! I have never enjoyed an anime more than this one. I lost it the first episode and was laughing with my boyfriend a lot! I seriously recommend this anime and so far watched collections 1-10 from early june to now since I like this anime so much.
Review Title: One piece collection one.
Rating: 5.0

I fully understood this video as a way for me to build better body mechanics/decrease injury risk while doing lower reps to a higher kettlebell weight. I was very happy with the result. I was sweaty, did my own stretching additional to warm up after the workout. I have been looking for a video like this to help advance me. I have prior experience with kettlbells and I can appreciate the instructors vision/ideals into this video.  I have had pain in the past from using higher weights and high reps and after doing these videos and the stretching I seriously feel good. I don't give this review lightly. I don't find it boring either as I add on to my other workouts and excited to have a video to use my heavier bells in. I thought there wasn't a way for me to advance past using a 25 pound bell but this dvd helped. My heavier ones 35 pound ones are in use now. I usually dead lifted my 25 pound bell. With this video I dared to dead lift 70 pounds when I weigh 130 and no pain feels awesome!  It makes me think I could go even heavier eventually as I build up tolerance.

As if things weren’t bleak enough, the gang finds themselves accused of a cold-hearted assassination attempt – and hunted by the entire city. Dark secrets and tragic pasts are revealed as Luffy and Zoro fall to a formidable foe, Chopper faces a life and death situation, and a monstrous storm threatens to sink the city once and for all!']

["Fresh off their adventure in Alabasta, the Straw Hats prepare to sail straight into the sky in this uncut, unedited twenty-six episode collection! Fortunately for the sake of adventure, Nico catches wind of a legendary liar whose monkey minions can equip any ship for a deadly ascent on the Knockup Stream. Hold on to your hats because the Straw Hats are about to find out if the Going Merry flies as well as she floats!"]

["The epic sets sail. It is the era of adventure, as countless souls are lured along the Grand Line in pursuit of dreams far greater than any they've ever dared to imagine. Wealth, fame, power - It's all available for the taking to the lucky soul that can find it: The legendary One Piece. Among those on the high seas is a youth on a quest to be king of them all - Luffy, the Straw Hat Pirate! But first he must find a ship, a crew and some supplies. Determined to recruit those at first unwilling to his cause, the young captain remains undaunted."]

Product Title: American Originals
Review Date: 2013/11/15
Store: Various  (Actor),     History  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, A&E Home Video, All A&E Titles
Product Description: ["They're a special breed - guys who go to work in the morning never knowing if they'll make it home alive that night. Every day is a struggle just to survive. For the loggers, wedged on a mountainside with behemoth trees, 60-ton machines, and razor-sharp chainsaws, the slightest miscalculation can spell disaster. The ice road truckers, steering gigantic 16-wheelers over frozen roads, face the specter of crashing through the surface, frostbite, or worse. And residents of the forbidding, icy north battle weather and unforgiving terrain just to eke out an existence. They all need every bit of ingenuity, grit, and know-how they can muster just to stay alive at least until the next gig.This adrenaline-pumping collection from HISTORY includes over 20 hours of action from Ax Men, Tougher in Alaska, and the record-breaking series Ice Road Truckers. You'll be awed as you watch these ordinary-seeming men face the kind of daily challenges most of us can't even imagine.Programs per disc:DISC 1: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 1: episodes 1-4DISC 2: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 2: episodes 5-8DISC 3: Ice Road Truckers S1, Vol 3: episodes 9-10 / bonus materialsDISC 4: Ice Road Truckers: On and Off The IceDISC 5: Dangerous Missions: Suicide Missions of D-Day / Marine Raiders / Forward Observers / PathfindersDISC 6: Dangerous Missions: Rescue Swimmers / Merrill's Marauders / Assault on Iwo Jima / Hostage NegotiatorsDISC 7: Ax Men S1, Vol 1: Man vs. Mountain / Risk and Reward / Storm Season Strikes / The Big HitDISC 8: Ax Men S1, Vol 2: Market Meltdown / Reversal of Fortune / The Close Call / Loggers Under FireDISC 9: Ax Men S1, Vol 3: A Logger's Thanksgiving / Black Friday / Storm of the CenturyDISC 10: Ax Men S1, Vol 4: The Toughest Season / Picking Up The Pieces / The Final HaulDISC 11: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 1: Episodes 1-4DISC 12: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 2: Episodes 5-7DISC 13: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 3: Episodes 8-10DISC 14: Tougher in Alaska S1, Vol 4: Episodes 11-13"]

Wealth, fame, power - It's all available for the taking to the lucky soul that can find it: The legendary One Piece. Among those on the high seas is a youth on a quest to be king of them all - Luffy, the Straw Hat Pirate! But first he must find a ship, a crew and some supplies. Determined to recruit those at first unwilling to his cause, the young captain remains undaunted."]

target_interaction.title: Very educational and insightful.
target_interaction.text: Very educational and easy to follow and understand. I wanted to learn more of the techniques and history behind them. This video does deliver. I recommend it.
target_interaction.title_meta: Tai Chi 37 Postures Martial Applications (YMAA) Dr. Yang, Jwing-Ming
description: Discover the Martial Art of Taijiquan

Taijiquan (Tai Chi Chuan) is an ancient internal Chinese martial art which has gained widespread popularity for its many health benefits. Today, most people practice taiji slowly to develop their balance, strength, and vitality, and the martial applications of the art are often ignored. Taijiquan, or 'Grand Ultimate Fist', is a highly effective form of combat specializing in short and middle-range fighting.

This program offers practical martial applications for each of the 37-postures of traditional Taiji, based on the forms passed down by Yang, Ban-Hou. Once the viewer has a basic understanding of these universal principles, you may use them to devise further applications for every movement no matter which style of Taiji you practice.
Learn the Basic Concepts of Taiji and Taijiquan. Understand the purpose of every Taiji movement. Over 50 effective applications for any Taijiquan style.
SPECIAL FEATURES: Multi-Language Menus/Subtitles: English, French, Spanish Interactive YMAA Catalog with 50 additional minutes of Preview Trailers for All YMAA Videos
Features senior YMAA students Pedro Rodrigues, Tony Chee, and Kathy Yang

YMAA PRODUCTION DR. YANG, JWING-MING TAIJI 37-POSTURES MARTIAL APPLICATIONS WRITTEN & PERFORMED BY DR. YANG, JWING-MING, WITH TONY CHEE, PEDRO RODRIGUES & KATHY YANG EDITING & DVD AUTHORING BY MEDIAMANIC PRODUCED BY DAVID SILVER DIRECTED BY DR. YANG, JWING-MING AND DAVID SILVER

Dr. Yang's ability is of the same high caliber as his written treatises. --Master Jou, Tsung-HwaDr. Yang surely follows in the footsteps of the Yang style founder Yang Lu-Chan, who also first studied the Shaolin hard styles and later studied and mastered the soft style of Taijiquan. Dr. Yang stimulates this tradition, which will surely bear the fruit of high achievement within the martial arts. --Grandmaster Liang, Tung-TsaiMan of the Year 2007 --Inside Kung Fu magazine
